DOC.brief_summary: This study will explore the safety and effectiveness of different doses of AGN 203818 in treating the pain associated with painful bladder syndrome/interstitial cystitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AGN 203818 for Pain Associated With Painful Bladder Syndrome/Interstitial Cystitis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of painful bladder syndrome/interstitial cystitis Moderate or severe bladder pain Any other uncontrolled disease Pregnant or nursing females
